author: mariohavel
content:
<@&857649635274915900> I got some exciting news about Office Hours calls! 

With project presentations done, upcoming Office Hours calls will be AMA sessions with mentors. Each call will be dedicated to discussion with a mentor from different team or research area. They are open to answer all of your questions, so I would like to ask you to prepare some questions in advance. 

The first AMA on Tuesday is going to be with Piper Merriam! If you are not sure who Piper is, trust me, he is an Ethereum legend. He has been contributing to Ethereum since early days, created this very fellowship program and recently, he pioneered Portal Network. I hope you will treat him with some interesting questions üôÇ 

Check call details here: 
https://github.com/eth-protocol-fellows/cohort-three/issues/239

author: pipermerriam
content: Looking forward to engaging with you all next week üòÅ
